title: Lambdaform Format executor
description: Wrapper around the 'nx format' and 'terraform fmt' commands. (https://nx.dev/packages/nx/documents/format-write and https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/fmt)

args.description: Used to provide additional arguments to the Terraform CLI. (https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/fmt)

terraformDirectory.description: The name of the project directory where the *.tf files are stored.

shell.description: Shell to execute the command with. Uses '/bin/sh' on Unix, and process.env.ComSpec on Windows, if no shell is specified.
